channel.title: Need help with coding my RSPS. [PI]
channel.description:
[b]IF anyone can help me just get a few things done, it'd be greatly appreciated.. I'm getting 40$ on paypal to give to who ever helped me btw..(; Anyways, If you could add me on MSN or comment back to this thread if your willing to help..(:
Few things i want done.:
STAFF: Make the command teleport, with rights 1+. [color=red](POSX 3232 POSY 2896)[/color] Add Black and Orange PHAT. (Rights 1+). Add Store in staff for Orange+Black phat. (Rights 1+) [color=red](posx = 3235 posy = 2900)[/color] Black partyHat [color=green](1+).[/color] Orange Parthat [color=green](2+).[/color]
Commands: ::Teleto [color=green](Rights 1+).[/color] ::Teletome [color=green](Rights 1+).[/color] ::Info (Shows whoevers bank+inventory.) [color=green](Rights 1+).[/color] ::Kick [color=green](Rights 1+).[/color] ::Giveitem [color=green](Rights 2+).[/color] ::Takeitem [color=green](Rights 2+).[/color] ::Pickup [color=green](Rights 2+).[/color] ::Item [color=green](Rights 2+).[/color] ::Pest ::Barrows ::gwds ::dbeast
Custom Items: (I got the packs for them). [color=purple]Beautiful Cape. Danger Cape. Demon Set. Monkey Bag. Admin GodSword. Cigarette.[/color]
I have more request, but these are just the basic ones. My server already has pest barrows, gwds, etc, just need the teleports.. I THINK my Compiler is broken? So if someone could help me fix that to it'd be great..<3
[color=red]RED- Coords.[/color] [color=green]Green- Rights.[/color] [color=purple]Purple- Customs.[/color]
I prefer to use [u]MSN[/u] over anything else. MY MSN- Br0k22@yahoo.com[/b]

@jc22493 wrote:

no requesting coders/ offering for someones work its not allowed. Start a development team

^

  • you can’t offer cash/rewards for help.

item.title: Need help with coding my RSPS. [PI]
item.dc:creator: @V_1_N_C_H V 1 N C H
item.description:
@V_1_N_C_H wrote:

teleto

if (playerCommand.startsWith("teleto")) { String name = playerCommand.substring(8); for (int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(name)) { c.getPA().movePlayer(Server.playerHandler.players[i].getX(), Server.playerHandler.players[i].getY(), Server.playerHandler.players[i].heightLevel); } } } }

teletome

if (playerCommand.startsWith("teletome")) { try { String playerToTele = playerCommand.substring(10); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToTele)) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; c2.sendMessage("You have been teleported to " + c.playerName); c2.getPA().movePlayer(c.getX(), c.getY(), c.heightLevel); break; } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }

Pickup and item are the same command…

Item

[code]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”)) {
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 20500) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“That item ID does not exist.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Wrong usage:(use as ::item 1 1)”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

			} // HERE?
			} // HERE?[/code]

Read full topic
